languages.text: {n}Маражай отводит взгляд от выхода из логова и смотрит на вас. С его лица сползает гримаса боевой ярости, и он убирает клинки в ножны.{/n} "Если твои лакеи удовольствовались спектаклем, то я бы перешел к делу. У меня есть к тебе разговор, {name}".

{n}Marazhai takes his eyes off the exit and looks at you. The contorted mask of battle rage slides from his face, and he sheathes his blades.{/n} "If your lackeys have seen enough of the show, I have business to discuss with you, {name}."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай отводит взгляд от выхода из логова и смотрит на вас. С его лица сползает гримаса боевой ярости, и он убирает клинки в ножны.{/n} "Если твои лакеи удовольствовались спектаклем, то я бы перешел к делу. У меня есть к тебе разговор, {name}".

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai takes his eyes off the exit and looks at you. The contorted mask of battle rage slides from his face, and he sheathes his blades.{/n} "If your lackeys have seen enough of the show, I have business to discuss with you, {name}."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai takes his eyes off the exit and looks at you. The contorted mask of battle rage slides from his face, and he sheathes his blades.{/n} "If your lackeys have seen enough of the show, I have business to discuss with you, {name}."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai takes his eyes off the exit and looks at you. The contorted mask of battle rage slides from his face, and he sheathes his blades.{/n} "If your lackeys have seen enough of the show, I have business to discuss with you, {name}."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai takes his eyes off the exit and looks at you. The contorted mask of battle rage slides from his face, and he sheathes his blades.{/n} "If your lackeys have seen enough of the show, I have business to discuss with you, {name}."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋目光不再看着出口的方向，而是望向了你，脸上疯狂、扭曲的表情也已然褪去。他收起了手里的武器。{/n}“你的喽啰们看好戏看够了吧？我有正事要和你商量，{name}。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai takes his eyes off the exit and looks at you. The contorted mask of battle rage slides from his face, and he sheathes his blades.{/n} "If your lackeys have seen enough of the show, I have business to discuss with you, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋目光不再看着出口的方向，而是望向了你，脸上疯狂、扭曲的表情也已然褪去。他收起了手里的武器。{/n}“你的喽啰们看好戏看够了吧？我有正事要和你商量，{name}。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai aparta la vista de la salida para mirarte. La expresión de furia combativa se desvanece de su rostro, y envaina ambas espadas.{/n} «Si tus lacayos ya han disfrutado suficiente del espectáculo, tengo asuntos que tratar contigo, {name}».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai takes his eyes off the exit and looks at you. The contorted mask of battle rage slides from his face, and he sheathes his blades.{/n} "If your lackeys have seen enough of the show, I have business to discuss with you, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai aparta la vista de la salida para mirarte. La expresión de furia combativa se desvanece de su rostro, y envaina ambas espadas.{/n} «Si tus lacayos ya han disfrutado suficiente del espectáculo, tengo asuntos que tratar contigo, {name}».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai se détourne de la sortie pour croiser votre regard. Le masque de rage qu'il affichait lors du combat disparaît tandis qu'il rengaine ses armes.{/n} « Si vous pensez que vos laquais ont compris la leçon, j'aimerais discuter de sujets plus importants avec vous, {name}. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai takes his eyes off the exit and looks at you. The contorted mask of battle rage slides from his face, and he sheathes his blades.{/n} "If your lackeys have seen enough of the show, I have business to discuss with you, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai se détourne de la sortie pour croiser votre regard. Le masque de rage qu'il affichait lors du combat disparaît tandis qu'il rengaine ses armes.{/n} « Si vous pensez que vos laquais ont compris la leçon, j'aimerais discuter de sujets plus importants avec vous, {name}. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai wendet seinen Blick vom Ausgang ab und blickt dich an. Die verzerrte Miene der Kampfeswut verschwindet aus seinem Gesicht und er steckt seine Klingen zurück.{/n} "Wenn Eure Lakaien endlich fertig sind mit ihrer Aufführung, muss ich mit Euch Geschäftliches besprechen, {name}."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai takes his eyes off the exit and looks at you. The contorted mask of battle rage slides from his face, and he sheathes his blades.{/n} "If your lackeys have seen enough of the show, I have business to discuss with you, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai wendet seinen Blick vom Ausgang ab und blickt dich an. Die verzerrte Miene der Kampfeswut verschwindet aus seinem Gesicht und er steckt seine Klingen zurück.{/n} "Wenn Eure Lakaien endlich fertig sind mit ihrer Aufführung, muss ich mit Euch Geschäftliches besprechen, {name}."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは出口から目を離し、あなたの方を見る。戦いの怒りで歪んだ仮面が滑り落ち、刃を鞘に収める。{/n}「お前の部下がショーに満足したのなら、話し合う余地はあるぜ、{name}」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai takes his eyes off the exit and looks at you. The contorted mask of battle rage slides from his face, and he sheathes his blades.{/n} "If your lackeys have seen enough of the show, I have business to discuss with you, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは出口から目を離し、あなたの方を見る。戦いの怒りで歪んだ仮面が滑り落ち、刃を鞘に収める。{/n}「お前の部下がショーに満足したのなら、話し合う余地はあるぜ、{name}」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, gözlerini çıkıştan çevirerek sana bakıyor. Ardına saklandığı savaş öfkesiyle dolu ifade, yüzünden düşüyor. Sonrasında bıçaklarını çekiyor.{/n} "Siz dalkavuklar gösteriye doyduysanız seninle konuşmam gereken bir şey var {name}."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai takes his eyes off the exit and looks at you. The contorted mask of battle rage slides from his face, and he sheathes his blades.{/n} "If your lackeys have seen enough of the show, I have business to discuss with you, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai, gözlerini çıkıştan çevirerek sana bakıyor. Ardına saklandığı savaş öfkesiyle dolu ifade yüzünden düşüyor ve bıçaklarını çekiyor.{/n} "Siz dalkavuklar gösteriye doyduysanız seninle konuşmam gereken bir işim var {name}."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
